units.title: Introduction to Python
units.description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming through interactive lessons that run directly in your browser.

units.title: Python Strings Deep Dive
units.description: Explore string manipulation, f-strings, type casting, and create fun projects like Mad Libs.

units.title: Python Conditionals (If/Else)
units.description: Learn how to control the flow of your programs using `if`, `else`, and `elif` statements.

units.title: Python Lists (Intro)
units.description: This worksheet is intended to show you how lists work in Python and how they compare with strings.

units.title: Python Lists (Advanced)
units.description: Stretch your understand of lists with an ethical puzzle.
